data.name: Channel
data.value: A collection of mods that share a similar state.

data.name: Channels_QueryPage
data.value: The page number of the channel query.

data.name: Channel_Name
data.value: The name of the channel.

data.name: Channel_NameQuery
data.value: The ID of the channel being queried for.

data.name: GameVersion_CreationTime
data.value: The DateTime in UTC at which the game version was created.

data.name: GameVersion_Name
data.value: The name of the version of the game.

data.name: GameVersion_SupportedMods
data.value: The mods that are compatible with this version of the game.

data.name: Link
data.value: A named reference to a web address.

data.name: Link_Name
data.value: The name of the source of the link.

data.name: Link_URL
data.value: The URL of the link.

data.name: LocalizedModInfo_Changelog
data.value: The changelog of the mod in the language of the localized mod info.

data.name: LocalizedModInfo_Credits
data.value: The credits of the mod in the language of the localized mod info.

data.name: LocalizedModInfo_Description
data.value: The description of the mod in the language of the localized mod info.

data.name: LocalizedModInfo_Name
data.value: The name of the language.

data.name: LocalizedModInfo_OwningMod
data.value: The mod that the localized mod info is localizing.

data.name: ModReference
data.value: A reference to a mod with a specific version range.

data.name: ModReference_ModID
data.value: The ID of the mod that's being referenced.

data.name: ModReference_VersionRange
data.value: The range of versions that the reference is corresponding to.

data.name: Mods_QueryPage
data.value: The page number of the mod query.

data.name: Mod_Authors
data.value: The authors of the mod. This is typically everyone who has added a significant amount to the mod.

data.name: Mod_Channel
data.value: The channel that this mod is located in.

data.name: Mod_Conflicts
data.value: The mods that are incompatible with this mod and will interfere with normal function.

data.name: Mod_Contributors
data.value: The contributors of the mod. This is typically anyone who has helped with creating the mod or invidiuals who helped with translation efforts.

data.name: Mod_Dependencies
data.value: The mods that are required for this mod to function properly.

data.name: Mod_DownloadLink
data.value: The download link of the mod.

data.name: Mod_EditedAt
data.value: The DateTime in UTC when the mod was last edited.

data.name: Mod_ID
data.value: The ID of the mod.

data.name: Mod_Links
data.value: The links associated with this mod.

data.name: Mod_Localizations
data.value: The localized information of the mod.

data.name: Mod_ReadableID
data.value: The human readable ID of the mod.

data.name: Mod_SupportedVersions
data.value: The versions that this mod is supported for.

data.name: Mod_UploadedAt
data.value: The DateTime in UTC when the mod was originally uploaded.

data.name: Mod_Uploader
data.value: The user who uploaded the mod.

data.name: Mod_Version
data.value: The SemVer version of the mod.

data.name: User
data.value: Represents an individual account on this Hive instance

data.name: User_AuthenticationType
data.value: The authentication type of the user.

data.name: User_ID
data.value: The ID of the user.

data.name: User_IsAuthenticated
data.value: Whether or not the user is authenticated.

data.name: User_Name
data.value: The name of the user.

data.name: User_Username
data.value: The username of the user.
